name: Planetoidee
description:
Set in some void of space (with way too much stars in the background anyway), you are at the head of a small army, when you are approached by a much more formidable force of enemies. Hopefully, they are all dumb robots, that even lack engines, so you can probably prevent your demise.

Left and Right to fire the engines, tap both to shoot a laser. Kill all enemies, get a win screen... or get a lose screen, in case all of your army dies.

Github repo
